Package camzup.core

Class Mesh2.Vert2

  • java.lang.Object
    • camzup.core.Mesh2.Vert2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Mesh2.Vert2>
    Enclosing class:
    Mesh2
    public static class Mesh2.Vert2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Mesh2.Vert2>
    Packages 2D mesh coordinates, texture coordinates and normals into a single object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Vec2 coord
      The coordinate of the vertex in world space.
      Vec2 texCoord
      The texture (UV) coordinate for an image mapped onto the mesh.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Vert2()
      The default constructor
      Vert2​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 texCoord)
      Constructs a vertex from a coordinate and texture coordinate.
